text: Ethan Hammerton (born 25 September 2000) is a British racing driver, who will compete in the British Touring Car Championship with Team HARD. with Trade Price Cars. He will step down to the Renault UK Clio Cup for 2019 with the same team. ==Racing record== ===Complete British Touring Car Championship results=== (key) (Races in bold indicate pole position – 1 point awarded just in first race; races in italics indicate fastest lap – 1 point awarded all races; * signifies that driver led race for at least one lap – 1 point given all races) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:85%" !
